website_summaries.verdict: Made of drop-forged steel, this hammer sells for less than some competitors yet offers the standard masonry benefits.
pros: Bonded together with epoxy for longevity and durability
This tool, with its strong steel shaft, is treated by the maker with heat
cons: Rare complaints about the durability of the hammer

customer_reviews.title: utter crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammer months in advance of a stint working as a stone mason...so I was past the date when I could get a refund or return the hammer...and on the first day I used it, I bent the handle...hitting a freaking brick! A brick hammer too weak to use to hit a brick? It is poorly designed with a heavy head but a ridiculously narrow and thin neck which bent and which I could then re-straighten with my bare hands...and I am no circus freak strongman. Don't waste your money on this piece of junk. I had to eat the cost of my now useless craphammer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great conch hammer, lol
customer_reviews.text: My use for this hammer is unconventional but it is a great little hammer. I use it to hammer live conch shells to create a hole to release the animal from the shell. Works amazingly. has a really nice heft and balance to it. I use it backward, but i do like the grip.
customer_reviews.author: OJ Gator

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to do yard work with; Jack out weeds, transplant smaller plants. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good price and seems well built. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: fulltimer

customer_reviews.title: essential for Hammerschlagen: sink nails like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for hammerschlagen. grip is sliding a bit from the metal but solid feel to hammer otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: PashPash

customer_reviews.title: Solid Brick Hammer
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty hammer, that has helped me trim 25 pound retaining wall bricks. It performs very well, even though my bricks are especially dense, and makes the job manageable. Not only is it a good tool, its affordable. Gives you everything the more expensive hammers offer, and I have not had any downsides yet. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: c54cotter

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammer, like another reviewer pointed out the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice hammer, like another reviewer pointed out the handle takes a bit of getting use to. But it is still funtional.
customer_reviews.author: Poppabear

customer_reviews.title: Used this to make a water level. Worked perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make a water level. Worked perfectly and the heavy construction allowed me to drag it around the construction site without making holes or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable hammer. I like the balance and grip. It is well made and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value...used it in Panama on a mission trip...left it there for a mason's use.
customer_reviews.author: william gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: Brick Hammer
customer_reviews.text: The Graintex brick hammer is good quality for the price. As a matter of fact the price was less than half of hardware stores in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Stuart

customer_reviews.title: As described.  Finger Grips Issue
customer_reviews.text: The hammer is as described and fit and finish is good for being less expensive than the others. The only reason for less than the full stars is that the finger grips are slightly annoying when you turn the hammer around to use the other end. Not problematic, but seems like a bad idea to use them. Also, rusted easily with just a few drops of water overnight. But the $20 savings got me over that, and it was bound to happen working around mortar and water.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty VT

customer_reviews.title: very very quility piece of equipment !!!
customer_reviews.text: wow I cant believe how well this brick hammer is made. it is really a beautiful durable piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: milleeran
